page.title: 03Wetwang,The weather
page.content:
The farm relies on good weather.It helps the farmer tremendously.Sometimes the farmer needs it to rain to help the crops to grow.In harvest it is vital that it sunshines a lot so that the crops can ripen and to dry the corn ready for the combine to cut.
In winter the weather can cause lots of problems like the frost freezing the water pipes for the cattle and blocking the roads for cattle feeds to get through.
The weather causes lots of problems for the farmer's family too.On the farm we always get a good stock of food before winter in case we get snowed in.
